my sound does not work can anyone help?: i would compile pulseaudio from source; its the only way i have been able to fix the sound on all ubuntu installs regardless of machine
let me find the website for you

download source code from here: http://pulseaudio.org/wiki/DownloadPulseAudio then open terminal, cd /home/user/Downloads, tar -xvf pulse*.gz, cd pulse*, ./configure && make && sudo make install (you may have to install the dependencies when ./configure fails)
